defaultFinancial.name: CARES act
defaultFinancial.description: The CARES act is a economic relief bill passed by congress aimed to help small businesses and individuals. Detailed information regarding how much money and its effects can be found at their website.

defaultFinancial.name: Disaster relief for food, housing, and bills
defaultFinancial.description: Covers things like an eviction ban for renters and food program rules easing.

defaultFinancial.name: CDC Financial Resources
defaultFinancial.description: A collection of resources provided by the CDC covering a wide range of topics from financial aid and budgeting to laws and frequently asked questions.
